comment.text: Fermentation; pyruvate fermentation to lactate; (S)-lactate from pyruvate: step 1/1.

disease.name: Glycogen storage disease 11
disease.description: A metabolic disorder that results in exertional myoglobinuria, pain, cramps and easy fatigue.

comment.text: The disease is caused by mutations affecting the gene represented in this entry.
Belongs to the LDH/MDH superfamily. LDH family.

comment.name: Protein Spotlight
comment.text: Another dark horse - Issue 109 of September 2009

property.value: Glycogen storage disease due to lactate dehydrogenase M-subunit deficiency

feature.description: Glycyl lysine isopeptide (Lys-Gly) (interchain with G-Cter in SUMO2); alternate
